item.title: Orkestra Day 1
item.description: Started working on the core shell of the application. Here is what it looks like after a session in Qt Designer The Notes scratch pad is functional with persistence. The toolbar has a configuration button which opens up a dialog with a couple of tabs. Here is the walkthrough video of using Qt Creator to develop this layout
